boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The world almost ended 71 years ago..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The plague came out of nowhere and ravaged the world. Most died within a week. Nothing could stop it. The world did its best. It wasn't good enough._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;For three generations, we, the last fragments of humanity have lived on the seas, on floating stations called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;havens._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; Far from the plague, we are able to provide supplies to the mainland to keep them (and us) from succumbing completely._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;We've managed to keep a network of the largest known cities in the world alive. Things have been tough the past few years. Cities far away from the havens have fallen off our grid..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Tomorrow, a small group of us head out into what's left of the world. We don't know what we'll find._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Pandemic Legacy: Season 2 is an epic cooperative game for 2 to 4 players. Unlike most other games, this one is working against you. What's more, some of the actions you take in Pandemic Legacy will carry over to future games. No two worlds will ever be alike!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Part of the Pandemic series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Ep 14 - Too Many Bones, Ex Libris, Dungeon Petz _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Pandemic Legacy 2
Episode 10 - Holy Reiner Knizia, We Made It To Double Digits!
Episode 12 - An End of Year Recap with Funny Names! (featuring Lorenzo il Magnifico, Pandemic Legacy Season 2, Ex Libris and many more!!!!)
Episode 22: The one about impromptu space operas, house rules, and having direction
Episode 34 - Matt Leacock, designer of iconic co-op Pandemic
Episode 37: The Godfather: A New Don, Shakespeare, Coal Baron, Bottom of the 9th, Pandemic Legacy Season 2
Episode 54 :: Yokohama Review + Questions from the hat with Cat
Episode 73 :: Castell Review + Top Board Games according to BGG Rankings
Episode 85 - Rob _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Kronos_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Daviau; The Man, The Myth, The Legacy
Episode 9 - Sexual Innuendo: The name of my new Worker Placement Game
Episode Delta - Top 10 Solitaire Games (2018 Edition)
TGT 069: Games Based on Existing IPs
TGT 108 On Topic: Generic Older Alpha Player Feedback
